channel.title: Alameda County Library
channel.description: Events at the Alameda County Library

item.title: Mon, Mar 19, 2012 -- Homework Help Center at 3:30 PM
item.description:
The Homework Help Center is open Monday - Thursday from 3:30 pm - 5:30 pm. Closed on school holidays. It is staffed by high school students and intended for children in grades K - 6 who have homework questions.

Contact: Children's Information Desk (510) 745-1421

Location: FREMONT BRANCH - Get Directions
item.author: ek_contact@plymouthrocket.com(No contact)

item.title: Mon, Mar 19, 2012 -- Toddler Time for 2 year olds at 7:00 PM
item.description:
Toddler Time is a 20 minute program for children 24 - 35 months old and a parent. It consists of stories, songs and fingerplays. Registration is necessary for this free program and begins Feb. 27 at 1 p.m. This session runs through March 26.

Contact: Children's Information Desk (510) 745-1421

Location: FREMONT BRANCH - Get Directions
item.author: ek_contact@plymouthrocket.com(No contact)

item.title: Tue, Mar 20, 2012 -- Tuesday Lapsit for Prewalkers - Registration Required at 1:30 PM
item.description:
Registration is required for this volunteer-led storytime and starts on 2/21/12.

Lapsit is designed for babies who are not yet able to walk. It consists of a 20 minute storytime with stories, rhymes, songs, fingerplays and lapjogs or bounces, followed by an informal "Stay and Play" for 20 minutes.

Contact: Children's Information Desk (510) 745-1421

Location: FREMONT BRANCH - Get Directions
item.author: ek_contact@plymouthrocket.com(No contact)

item.title: Tue, Mar 20, 2012 -- Storytime with the Tooth Fairy at 2:15 PM
item.description:
Please join the Tooth Fairy from the Newpark Mall Family Dental Group for a a program that includes a story and information on good dental health for children. All children will receive a dental goody bag.

Contact: Children's Information Desk (510) 745-1421

Location: FREMONT BRANCH - Get Directions
item.author: ek_contact@plymouthrocket.com(No contact)

item.title: Tue, Mar 20, 2012 -- Art is Education Paper Quilts at 3:30 PM
item.description:
Art is Education (www.artiseducation.org) is partnering with many groups in Alameda County to promote art in our communities. We will be making paper quilts (each child will make one square that will be added to the larger quilt that will go on display and another square that they can take home). All supplies will be provided at the event. We will be working with the theme, "Creating a Better World Together". Since this project will be limited in space, we will pass out free tickets beginning at 3:15 pm at the Children's Desk. Each child must have a ticket to enter the program, and space is limited to 45 children. Younger children must have an adult helper as the program is designed for school-aged children.

Contact: Children's Information Desk (510) 745-1421

Location: FREMONT BRANCH - Get Directions
item.author: ek_contact@plymouthrocket.com(No contact)
